# Quick Nav

**Tag:** `cui-quick-nav`  
**Category:** components  
**Source:** https://coherence-ftekb0dcfpcjb3gv.b02.azurefd.net/resources/quick-nav/

## Import

```js
import '@charm-ux/cui/dist/components/quick-nav/index.js'
```


> Quick navigation (quick nav) is a dropdown menu that allows you to customize button code to act as the menu heading and add as many menu items as apply. Quick nav should be implemented as a tertiary navigational tool that allows users to quickly select from a longer list of items.

## Guidance

### Standards

- You must meet the following requirements when using this component.

### Anatomy

- Quick nav (Subtle dropdown button)
- Dropdown
- Search (optional)

### Layout

- Depending on the scenario and content hierarchy, the quick nav can be used in the breadcrumb or within the page content area.

### Placement content area

- Quick nav should be placed directly above it’s related content.

### Provide feedback

- Reach out to us if you spot a bug or have a feature request. Your feedback is critical to the success of Coherence and everyone who uses it.
- Contact us on Teams
